amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on improving trauma training for trauma teams of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3926 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3926 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To require the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on improving trauma training for trauma teams of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3926 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3926 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
